response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. With its exceptional features and unparalleled performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. Given its high-quality nature, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $15,000. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 15000}
